closed_units.description: this refers to the count of loan numbers with a non null 'Closing Date'
closed_units.example_prompt: how many closed units did the BRC branch have in 2024
closed_units.example_solution: select_base('loans'), filter_dataframe('Closing Date', '>=', '2024-01-01'), filter_dataframe('Closing Date', '<=', '2024-12-31'), aggregate('count')
